leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-性质预测与材料信息学生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 数据库 + 模型库 + benchmark

tools.name: PPG
tools.one_line_profile: Heart rate estimation from PPG signals using Subspace Decomposition and Kalman filter
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation for estimating heart rate from Photoplethysmogram (PPG) signals. It utilizes Subspace Decomposition and Kalman smoothing techniques to process physiological signals, specifically designed for datasets like the 2015 IEEE Signal Processing Cup.

tools.name: aiida-gromacs
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow automation engine that interfaces with GROMACS, a widely used molecular dynamics package. It allows users to automate, manage, and reproduce GROMACS simulations within the AiiDA ecosystem.

tools.name: ChemParse
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for quantum chemistry output files (ORCA, GPAW)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to parse output files from various quantum chemistry software packages, specifically supporting ORCA (.out) and GPAW (.txt) formats. It facilitates the extraction of structured data from computational chemistry logs.

tools.name: crystmatch
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure matching analysis for phase transitions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for enumerating and analyzing crystal-structure matches, specifically focused on solid-solid phase transitions. It aids in understanding structural relationships and transformations in materials science.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-espresso
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen addon for parsing Quantum ESPRESSO files
tools.detailed_description: An extension for the pymatgen library dedicated to parsing input and output files from Quantum ESPRESSO, a suite for electronic-structure calculations. It enhances pymatgen's capability to handle QE data for materials informatics.

tools.name: vaspchg_rs
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library to parse VASP charge density files (CHGCAR)
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Rust library designed to parse VASP charge density files (CHGCAR). It provides efficient I/O handling for large volumetric data generated by VASP calculations.

tools.name: wavecar_parser
tools.one_line_profile: C++ parser for VASP WAVECAR files
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for parsing VASP WAVECAR files, which contain pseudo-wavefunction data. It allows for the extraction of wavefunction coefficients and plotting of pseudo-wavefunctions.

tools.name: aiida-fleur
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the FLEUR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that interfaces with the FLEUR code (all-electron DFT), enabling high-throughput electronic structure calculations and data provenance tracking.

tools.name: aiida-kkr
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the JuKKR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that interfaces with the JuKKR code (KKR Green function method), facilitating high-throughput density functional theory calculations.

tools.name: Materials-Design-Ontology
tools.one_line_profile: Ontology for the Materials Design Domain
tools.detailed_description: An ontology defining the semantic structure and relationships for the materials design domain, facilitating data interoperability and knowledge representation in materials science.

tools.name: Soft-Robotics-Materials-Database
tools.one_line_profile: Database of materials for soft robotics
tools.detailed_description: A database repository containing mechanical properties and characterization data of materials used in soft robotics applications.

tools.name: SuperalloyDigger
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for extracting superalloy data from literature
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to batch download documents, locate target sentences, and automatically extract material-property-value triples from scientific literature, specifically for superalloys.

tools.name: optimade-gateway
tools.one_line_profile: Gateway for querying OPTIMADE APIs
tools.detailed_description: A gateway service that allows users to query multiple OPTIMADE-compliant materials databases through a single interface, facilitating federated search.

tools.name: optimade-python-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Python tools for OPTIMADE API implementation
tools.detailed_description: A library providing tools for implementing and consuming OPTIMADE (Open Databases Integration for Materials Design) APIs, including validation and data conversion.

tools.name: atomate2-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS workflows for atomate2
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for atomate2 that implements workflows for running and managing LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: matcher
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical structure optimization analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool built around mmpdb for understanding how chemical structure optimization problems have been solved, enabling deep control over searching structure/activity relationships (SAR).

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for molecular deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers for end-to-end deep learning on molecular and crystal structures, integrating with rdkit and pymatgen.

tools.name: avogadrolibs
tools.one_line_profile: Libraries for molecular visualization and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A set of libraries providing 3D rendering, visualization, analysis, and data processing capabilities for computational chemistry, molecular modeling, and materials science.

tools.name: dfttk-20210211
tools.one_line_profile: DFT workflows for finite temperature thermodynamics (Archived)
tools.detailed_description: Density functional theory workflows for calculating finite temperature thermodynamics, based on atomate workflows. (Archived version).

tools.name: dfttk
tools.one_line_profile: DFT workflows for finite temperature thermodynamics
tools.detailed_description: Density functional theory workflows for calculating finite temperature thermodynamics, built upon atomate workflows.

tools.name: VASP_XDATCAR
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for VASP XDATCAR files
tools.detailed_description: A Python class designed to parse VASP XDATCAR output files generated from molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: VaspBandUnfolding
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for VASP band unfolding analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts for processing VASP outputs (WAVECAR, POTCAR) and performing band unfolding analysis.

tools.name: quacc
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible platform for computational materials science workflows and quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A platform built for the big data era in computational materials science, enabling complex workflows and data management for quantum chemistry codes like VASP and ASE.

tools.name: readcif
tools.one_line_profile: Fast C++ parser for CIF and mmCIF crystallographic files
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C++ library for parsing Crystallographic Information Files (CIF) and macromolecular CIF (mmCIF), essential for structural biology and materials science data processing.

tools.name: ShakeNBreak
tools.one_line_profile: Defect structure-searching method using chemically-guided bond distortions
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for generating defect structures by applying chemically-guided bond distortions to identify ground-state defect configurations in materials.

tools.name: ThermoParser
tools.one_line_profile: Data analysis and visualization tool for thermoelectrics
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to streamline the analysis and visualization of data related to thermoelectrics and charge carrier transport in computational materials science.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generation, processing, and analysis of defect supercell calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python software implementing a reproducible and efficient workflow for defect simulation, including generation of supercells and pre-/post-processing of calculations.

tools.name: surfaxe
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating and analyzing surface slabs for first-principles calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for automating the generation of surface slabs from bulk structures and analyzing their properties for first-principles calculations.

tools.name: VASP-DOS_extractor
tools.one_line_profile: Script to extract Density of States (DOS) from VASP outputs
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based Python script designed to extract total and projected density of states (DOS) data from VASP vasprun.xml files.

tools.name: VASP-Structural_Descriptors
tools.one_line_profile: Script to collect structural descriptors from atomic structures
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based script for generating and collecting structural descriptors/features from large sets of atomic structures for materials informatics.

tools.name: batterydatabase
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for auto-generating battery materials databases
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools designed to automate the generation and management of databases specifically for battery materials.

tools.name: aiida-champ
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the CHAMP Quantum Monte Carlo code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow platform to interface with and orchestrate calculations using the CHAMP Quantum Monte Carlo software.

tools.name: aiida-qp2
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum Package 2.0
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow platform to manage calculations with Quantum Package 2.0, enabling automated quantum chemistry workflows.

tools.name: SMACT
tools.one_line_profile: Semiconducting Materials by Analogy and Chemical Theory
tools.detailed_description: A Python package to aid materials design and informatics by applying chemical theory and analogy to identify potential semiconducting materials.

tools.name: mcp-atomictoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: MCP server for atomistic simulation capabilities
tools.detailed_description: A server implementing the Model Context Protocol (MCP) to provide atomistic simulation capabilities (via ASE, pymatgen) to AI agents/LLMs.

tools.name: memetic_thin_film_py
tools.one_line_profile: Thin-film optical structure design using memetic algorithms
tools.detailed_description: Python software for designing thin-film optical structures to match target spectral properties using memetic optimization algorithms.

tools.name: thin_film_memetic_optimization
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB tool for thin-film optical structure design
tools.detailed_description: MATLAB program for designing thin-film optical structures to match target spectral properties using memetic algorithms.

tools.name: aiida-cusp
tools.one_line_profile: Custodian-based VASP plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A VASP plugin for AiiDA that leverages Custodian for error handling and robust calculation management.

tools.name: aiida-phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for phonon calculations using Phonopy
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow platform to perform phonon calculations using the Phonopy software package.

tools.name: aiida-trains-pot
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA workflow for automated active learning training of neural network interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated active learning workflow implemented in AiiDA to train neural network interatomic potentials, facilitating the generation of machine learning potentials for materials simulations.

tools.name: aiida-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for running VASP simulations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that provides an interface to the VASP (Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package) code, enabling automated and reproducible density functional theory calculations.

tools.name: parsevasp
tools.one_line_profile: General-purpose parser for VASP output files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to parse various output files from the VASP code, extracting scientific data such as structures, energies, and electronic properties for downstream analysis.

tools.name: aiidalab
tools.one_line_profile: Core platform for AiiDAlab web-based materials science environment
tools.detailed_description: Implements the core functionality for AiiDAlab, a web-based platform that allows researchers to access and run AiiDA workflows and applications through a Jupyter-based interface.

tools.name: aiidalab-qe
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for Quantum ESPRESSO simulations
tools.detailed_description: A graphical application within the AiiDAlab platform that simplifies the setup, execution, and analysis of Quantum ESPRESSO calculations for materials properties.

tools.name: aiida-ase
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE)
tools.detailed_description: Integrates the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) with AiiDA, allowing users to leverage ASE's calculators and structure manipulation tools within AiiDA workflows.

tools.name: aiida-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for LAMMPS molecular dynamics code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin connecting AiiDA with LAMMPS, enabling the automation and provenance tracking of molecular dynamics simulations for materials research.

tools.name: aiida-common-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized workflow interfaces for materials science codes in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing common interfaces for workflows across different quantum engines (e.g., VASP, QE, CP2K) in AiiDA, facilitating cross-code verification and interoperability.

tools.name: aiida-core
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow engine for reproducible materials science simulations
tools.detailed_description: The core AiiDA platform, an open-source workflow manager for computational science that handles provenance tracking, automation, and high-throughput calculations.

tools.name: aiida-cp2k
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CP2K quantum chemistry code
tools.detailed_description: Enables the execution and management of CP2K calculations within the AiiDA framework, supporting atomistic simulations of solid state, liquid, and biological systems.

tools.name: aiida-hubbard
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for calculating Hubbard U parameters
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA workflows for the automated calculation of self-consistent onsite and intersite Hubbard parameters from first-principles using linear response theory.

tools.name: aiida-quantumespresso
tools.one_line_profile: Official AiiDA plugin for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: Provides a comprehensive interface to the Quantum ESPRESSO suite within AiiDA, enabling advanced workflows for electronic structure calculations, including PWscf, PHonon, and more.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Wannier90
tools.detailed_description: Connects AiiDA with the Wannier90 code, allowing for the automated calculation of maximally localized Wannier functions and related properties.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflows for Wannier90 calculations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of advanced, automated workflows for computing Wannier functions using AiiDA and Wannier90, designed to handle complex calculation sequences robustly.

tools.name: aiida-workgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive workflow manager and GUI for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A tool to efficiently design and manage flexible AiiDA workflows, featuring an interactive GUI, checkpointing, and provenance tracking capabilities.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Software package for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library for atomistic materials design, providing tools for high-throughput calculations, machine learning, and analysis of materials properties, associated with the NIST-JARVIS database.

tools.name: metis-gui
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for X-ray diffraction data simulations and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A modular standalone fat-client GUI designed for the simulation, analysis, and sharing of X-ray diffraction (XRD) data, facilitating materials characterization.

tools.name: aiida-vibroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automated calculation of vibrational properties (IR/Raman spectra, phonons)
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that automates the calculation of vibrational properties such as infrared and Raman spectra, as well as phonon dispersions, using various density functional theory codes.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality rendering of atoms and molecules using Blender
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that interfaces with Blender to generate publication-quality 3D renderings of atomic structures and molecules, supporting standard file formats like CIF and XYZ.

tools.name: LLaMP
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal RAG agent for materials informatics powered by LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A framework that integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) with high-fidelity materials informatics databases (like Materials Project) to perform agentic materials design, property prediction, and data retrieval.

tools.name: ase-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 2D/3D visualization for atomic structures in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool designed for the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) and Pymatgen, enabling interactive 2D (SVG) and 3D (Three.js) rendering of crystal structures and molecules directly within Jupyter Notebooks.

tools.name: cod-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for handling and parsing CIF files for the Crystallography Open Database
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Perl scripts and modules for parsing, checking, and manipulating Crystallographic Information Files (CIF), maintained by the developers of the Crystallography Open Database (COD).

tools.name: DeepMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation and MD
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package that generates accurate many-body potential energy surfaces and force fields for molecular dynamics simulations, bridging the gap between ab initio accuracy and classical MD efficiency.

tools.name: dftd4
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-charge dependent London dispersion correction
tools.detailed_description: A generally applicable implementation of the D4 London dispersion correction for Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations, improving the accuracy of non-covalent interaction energies.

tools.name: SciGlass
tools.one_line_profile: Database containing properties of glass materials
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing a vast set of data on the properties of glass materials, serving as a materials database.

tools.name: aiida-defects
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for point defect calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA platform providing workflows for calculations with defects in materials.

tools.name: MPcat
tools.one_line_profile: Interface between Materials Project and Schrodinger API
tools.detailed_description: An interface between the Materials Project software suite and the Schrodinger Python API, designed to allow for high-throughput execution of Jaguar and AutoTS calculations for molecular thermodynamics and kinetics.

tools.name: aiida-orca
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA Plugin for ORCA quantum chemistry package
tools.detailed_description: AiiDA Plugin for ORCA, enabling the automation of ORCA calculations within the AiiDA workflow engine.

tools.name: p2ptrans
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithm to match crystal structures atom-to-atom
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm to match crystal structures atom-to-atom, useful for analyzing phase transitions or structural similarities.

tools.name: bandstructureplots
tools.one_line_profile: Band structure plotting tool using pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: Band structure plots using pymatgen and a rgb scale to look at atomic or orbital contributions.

tools.name: cif-parsers
tools.one_line_profile: PDBx/mmCIF parsers in Python & JavaScript
tools.detailed_description: PDBx/mmCIF parsers implemented in Python & JavaScript, facilitating the reading and processing of crystallographic information files.

tools.name: PDBeCIF
tools.one_line_profile: PDBe mmCif/CIF/STAR parser and API
tools.detailed_description: Protein Data Bank in Europe (PDBe) mmCif/CIF/STAR parser and API for handling macromolecular structure data.

tools.name: chemml
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning and informatics suite for chemical and materials sciences
tools.detailed_description: ChemML is a machine learning and informatics program suite for the chemical and materials sciences, providing tools for data mining and modeling.

tools.name: atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: atomate is a powerful software for computational materials science and contains pre-built workflows for running simulations (e.g., VASP, FireWorks).

tools.name: matminer
tools.one_line_profile: Data mining library for materials science
tools.detailed_description: Data mining for materials science, providing tools for data retrieval, feature extraction, and analysis.

tools.name: robocrystallographer
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic generation of crystal structure descriptions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic generation of crystal structure descriptions, converting structural data into human-readable text.

tools.name: maptools
tools.one_line_profile: Materials simulation data processing tools
tools.detailed_description: A open source program for materials simulation data process, which is mainly based on Pymatgen code.

tools.name: hzdplugins
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for AiiDA structure construction and viewing
tools.detailed_description: A useful toolbox for using Aiida and constructing and viewing your initial structure for the simulation.

tools.name: compchem_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for AiiDA, Pymatgen and VASP
tools.detailed_description: Collection of python functions to work with aiida, pymatgen and VASP. Designed to speed up input setup and output analysis.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ANI-1 neural net potential interface for ASE
tools.detailed_description: ANI-1 neural net potential with python interface (ASE), enabling machine learning potential calculations in atomic simulations.

tools.name: aiidalab-ispg
tools.one_line_profile: Ab initio UV/vis spectroscopy workflows (ATMOSPEC)
tools.detailed_description: ATMOSPEC: ab initio UV/vis spectroscopy for everyone, implemented as an AiiDA Lab application.

tools.name: pymatviz
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization toolkit for materials informatics
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for visualizations in materials informatics, providing specialized plotting functions for materials data.

tools.name: vasp-interface
tools.one_line_profile: ASE compliant Python interface to VASP
tools.detailed_description: New ASE compliant Python interface to VASP, facilitating the setup and execution of VASP calculations.

tools.name: pourbaix
tools.one_line_profile: Method to generate Pourbaix diagrams using Python and pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that leverages pymatgen to calculate and generate Pourbaix diagrams (potential-pH diagrams) for analyzing the electrochemical stability of materials in aqueous environments.

tools.name: Emap2sec
tools.one_line_profile: Computational tool to identify protein secondary structures from cryo-EM maps
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool designed to detect protein secondary structures (alpha helices, beta sheets, etc.) directly from electron microscopy (EM) density maps.

tools.name: JARVIS-FF
tools.one_line_profile: Data and scripts for evaluation of interatomic potentials/force-fields
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing data and LAMMPS scripts for the evaluation of classical force-fields and interatomic potentials, part of the JARVIS infrastructure for materials design.

tools.name: structuregraph-helpers
tools.one_line_profile: Helpers for working with pymatgen structure graphs
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utility functions to facilitate the manipulation and analysis of crystal structure graphs generated by pymatgen, aiding in structural analysis tasks.

tools.name: perovskites-distortions
tools.one_line_profile: Functions to analyse structures of hybrid organic-inorganic perovskites
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for analyzing structural distortions in hybrid organic-inorganic perovskites, providing specific metrics relevant to this class of materials.

tools.name: construction_zone
tools.one_line_profile: Modules for generating nanoscale atomic scenes for S/TEM simulation
tools.detailed_description: A toolset for constructing complex atomic structures and scenes, primarily designed to generate inputs for Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy (S/TEM) image simulations.

tools.name: aiida-lsmo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA workflows for the LSMO laboratory at EPFL
tools.detailed_description: A collection of AiiDA workflows and plugins developed for the LSMO laboratory, facilitating automated calculations for specific materials science tasks.

tools.name: aiida-raspa
tools.one_line_profile: The RASPA plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that interfaces with the RASPA code, enabling the simulation of adsorption and diffusion in porous materials within automated workflows.

tools.name: aiida-zeopp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for zeo++
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin for Zeo++, a software package for performing geometry-based analysis of porous materials (e.g., surface area, pore diameter).

tools.name: aiida-graph-render
tools.one_line_profile: Render complex AiiDA provenance graphs using GePhi
tools.detailed_description: A utility to export and render AiiDA provenance graphs using GePhi, aiding in the visualization of complex scientific workflows and data lineage.

tools.name: aiida-explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive provenance browser for AiiDA databases
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for exploring AiiDA databases, allowing users to visualize and navigate the provenance graph of scientific calculations.

tools.name: optimade-maker
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for making OPTIMADE APIs from structural data
tools.detailed_description: A library to facilitate the creation of OPTIMADE-compliant APIs from various structural data formats (e.g., CIF archives), promoting data interoperability.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Custom workflow for Materials Project
tools.detailed_description: A package that integrates pymatgen, custodian, and FireWorks to define and manage the custom high-throughput workflows used by the Materials Project.

tools.name: mp-api
tools.one_line_profile: New API client for the Materials Project
tools.detailed_description: The official Python client for accessing the Materials Project API, enabling programmatic retrieval of materials data, properties, and structures.

tools.name: atomate2
tools.one_line_profile: Library of computational materials science workflows
tools.detailed_description: A modern library of computational materials science workflows, built on top of Jobflow and Pymatgen, designed for high-throughput computing.

tools.name: emmet
tools.one_line_profile: Builder of databases of material properties
tools.detailed_description: A core library for the Materials Project that handles the building of material property databases from raw calculation outputs (ETL pipelines).

tools.name: mpmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to facilitate the setup, execution, and analysis of ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations, leveraging the Materials Project infrastructure.

tools.name: pymatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Robust materials analysis code for structures and molecules
tools.detailed_description: A core Python library for materials analysis, defining classes for structures and molecules, and providing support for input/output handling of many electronic structure codes.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for alloy system analysis
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen providing specialized classes and functions for describing and analyzing alloy systems.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-defects
tools.one_line_profile: Defect analysis modules for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A pymatgen extension for analyzing point defects in materials, including formation energies and thermodynamic stability.

tools.name: pymatgen-db
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for creating Materials Project-style databases
tools.detailed_description: A library that facilitates the creation and management of MongoDB databases for materials data, following the schema and conventions of the Materials Project.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive input/output validator for VASP calculations
tools.detailed_description: A tool for validating VASP calculation inputs and outputs to ensure compatibility with Materials Project standards and data quality.

tools.name: matgenie
tools.one_line_profile: Web interface to pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A web-based user interface that exposes pymatgen functionalities, allowing users to perform materials analysis tasks through a browser.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for analyzing diffusion in materials
tools.detailed_description: An add-on to pymatgen providing algorithms and tools for analyzing diffusion pathways and mechanisms in materials, often used for battery materials research.

tools.name: aiida-autocas
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automatic active space selection in multireference calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that automates the selection of active spaces for multireference quantum chemical calculations, facilitating complex electronic structure simulations.

tools.name: aiida-dynamic-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for defining dynamic workflows using Python functions
tools.detailed_description: An extension for AiiDA that allows users to define and execute dynamic workflows directly via Python functions, enhancing flexibility in computational materials science pipelines.

tools.name: aiida-pyscf
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for PySCF quantum chemistry framework
tools.detailed_description: Integrates the PySCF (Python-based Simulations of Chemistry Framework) into the AiiDA ecosystem, enabling provenance tracking and workflow automation for quantum chemistry simulations.

tools.name: mispr
tools.one_line_profile: Automation framework for materials science computations
tools.detailed_description: A software package designed to automate materials science computations, likely integrating with DFT codes and database infrastructures to streamline high-throughput screening.

tools.name: abcv
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal structure viewer based on fresnel and pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based visualization tool for crystal structures that leverages the fresnel ray-tracing library and pymatgen for structure manipulation, providing high-quality rendering for materials science.

tools.name: aiida-gaussian
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Gaussian quantum chemistry software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin connecting the Gaussian quantum chemistry software package with the AiiDA workflow engine, enabling automated electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: aiidalab-empa-surfaces
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for on-surface chemistry
tools.detailed_description: An application designed for the AiiDAlab platform to simulate and analyze on-surface chemistry phenomena, developed at Empa.

tools.name: JAQPOT Quattro API
tools.one_line_profile: RESTful web service for toxicological predictions and nano-materials modeling
tools.detailed_description: A web service API for training machine learning models and generating toxicological predictions for chemical compounds and engineered nanomaterials (nanoinformatics).

tools.name: pymatgen-io-openmm
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen IO module for OpenMM simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that facilitates the setup and execution of OpenMM molecular dynamics simulations using pymatgen data structures, bridging materials analysis and MD simulation.

tools.name: widget-bandsplot
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for plotting electronic band structures and DOS
tools.detailed_description: A Jupyter interactive widget designed for visualizing electronic band structures and density of states (DOS) in computational materials science.

tools.name: pyiron
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated development environment for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management framework and IDE for computational materials science that simplifies the setup, execution, and analysis of complex atomistic simulations.

tools.name: python-workflow-definition
tools.one_line_profile: Interoperability layer for scientific workflows (AiiDA, Jobflow, Pyiron)
tools.detailed_description: Defines a common Python interface for scientific workflows to enable interoperability between major materials science workflow engines like AiiDA, Jobflow, and Pyiron.

tools.name: mapp_api
tools.one_line_profile: Batch calculation tool for materials properties prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool or API designed for batch processing and calculation of materials properties, likely supporting a specific prediction project or database.

tools.name: 4d_plant_analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Space-time registration method for growing plant analysis
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for the 4D (space-time) analysis of plant growth, using topological skeletons and geometric matching to register plant organs across time steps.

tools.name: atomate2_ffforge
tools.one_line_profile: Active-learning workflow for building machine-learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A workflow built on atomate2 and jobflow that automates the generation of machine-learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) via active learning, targeting materials like batteries and catalysts.

tools.name: atomium
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for parsing, manipulating, and saving macromolecular structures (PDB, CIF, MMTF)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for parsing and generating standard macromolecular file formats such as .pdb, .cif, and .mmtf. It provides an object model for manipulating molecular structures.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific Python package for solving Slater Koster tight-binding topological hamiltonians
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for calculating electronic structure properties using the Slater-Koster tight-binding method, specifically focused on topological hamiltonians.

tools.name: aiida-siesta
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the SIESTA DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow management system that interfaces with the SIESTA density functional theory code, enabling automated high-throughput calculations.

tools.name: materials_data_api_scripts
tools.one_line_profile: ETL scripts for aggregating data from ICSD, Materials Project, and OQMD
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts designed to query, download, and normalize materials data from major databases (ICSD, Materials Project, OQMD) for local analysis.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIP)
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA framework to manage workflows involving Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIP), facilitating the training and usage of ML potentials in materials simulations.

tools.name: crystcif-parse
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript parser for Crystallography CIF files
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight JavaScript library for parsing Crystallographic Information Files (CIF), enabling web-based applications to read and process crystal structure data.

tools.name: blase
tools.one_line_profile: Blender visualization for ASE atoms and molecules
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that interfaces between the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) and Blender to create high-quality 3D renderings and visualizations of atomic structures and molecules.

tools.name: ml_atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-assisted Atomate workflows for materials screening
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the Atomate workflow library that integrates machine learning techniques to assist in autonomous computational materials screening and property prediction.

tools.name: cifplayer
tools.one_line_profile: HTML5 visualization for chemical structures (CIF, POSCAR, OPTIMADE)
tools.detailed_description: A minimalistic and fast HTML5-based visualization tool for rendering chemical structures from various formats including CIF, POSCAR, and OPTIMADE JSON.

tools.name: optimade-client
tools.one_line_profile: TypeScript client for aggregating OPTIMADE providers
tools.detailed_description: An isomorphic TypeScript/JavaScript client library designed to query and aggregate data from multiple official OPTIMADE (Open Databases Integration for Materials Design) providers.

tools.name: optimade.science
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based GUI for searching OPTIMADE databases
tools.detailed_description: A web-based graphical user interface acting as a 'sky-scanner' for materials science databases, allowing users to search across multiple OPTIMADE-compliant repositories.

tools.name: quantum_esperanto
tools.one_line_profile: Fast parser for VASP XML logs
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance parser written in Cython for processing XML output logs generated by the Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP).

tools.name: tilde
tools.one_line_profile: Materials informatics framework for ab initio data repositories
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for managing and organizing ab initio materials science data, facilitating the creation and maintenance of data repositories.

tools.name: SAMOSA
tools.one_line_profile: Protocol for generating activated crystal structures by removing solvents from experimental data
tools.detailed_description: Structural Activation via Metal Oxidation State Analysis (SAMOSA) is a tool designed to generate activated crystal structures from experimental crystallographic information, specifically focusing on solvent removal protocols.

tools.name: JARVIS-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source software package for data-driven atomistic materials design
tools.detailed_description: JARVIS-Tools is a comprehensive software package developed by NIST for data-driven atomistic materials design. It provides tools for high-throughput calculations, materials informatics, and database management.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Simulation Toolkit for automating electronic structure calculations
tools.detailed_description: MAST (MAterials Simulation Toolkit) is a workflow automation tool designed to work with pymatgen for managing and executing materials simulation tasks, particularly electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: edf-converter
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for EyeLink 1000 EDF files to MATLAB structures
tools.detailed_description: A C++ utility to convert EyeLink 1000 EDF files (eye-tracking data) into MATLAB structures, facilitating data analysis in neuroscience and psychology research.

tools.name: aiida-yambo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the Yambo many-body perturbation theory code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that interfaces with the Yambo code, enabling automated many-body perturbation theory calculations for materials science.

tools.name: XenonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for materials informatics and transfer learning
tools.detailed_description: XenonPy is a Python library designed for materials informatics, offering capabilities for descriptor generation, transfer learning, and machine learning model building specifically for materials science applications.

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Library for plotting ternary phase diagrams for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically designed to draw ternary diagrams (phase diagrams) easily, providing a lightweight alternative to larger frameworks like pymatgen for this specific visualization task.

tools.name: aiida-castep
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automating CASTEP material calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager that provides an interface to the CASTEP DFT code, enabling automated and reproducible materials calculations and provenance tracking.
